headline: ‘Baseload Power’ Will Be Big in 2026. 5 Stocks Can Win.
summary: The buildout of AI data centers has been a boon for utilities, makers of power-generation equipment, and hosts of industrial companies supplying electrical components.  Investors, however, might need to refine their portfolios a little to keep getting the jolt from artificial intelligence.  “Heading into 2026, we expect baseload power sources to remain top of mind for investors, though we expect the thematic trade to become more nuanced by individual stock fundamentals and valuation, rather than simply by exposure,” wrote J.P. Morgan analyst Mark Strouse on Monday.

content.title: ‘Baseload Power’ Will Be Big in 2026. 5 Stocks Can Win.

Morgan analyst Mark Strouse on Monday.

headline: GE Vernova Sets New GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS™ title for the Largest Online Toy Drive in 24 Hours, Inspiring the Next Generation of STEM Leaders
summary: CAMBRIDGE, Mass., December 08, 2025--GE Vernova today announced it has set a new GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS title for the largest online toy drive in 24 hours, marking a milestone in its global giving campaign focused on inspiring curiosity in future innovators through STEM-focused play.

content.title: GE Vernova Sets New GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS™ title for the Largest Online Toy Drive in 24 Hours, Inspiring the Next Generation of STEM Leaders
